name: Turnland
description:
TURNLAND is a action platformer puzzle. There was a war between the gods. Zeus confine Hades in Turnland, the world of electricity. Help hades recover his fireball and return to hell.

CONTROLS

LEFT- Move to left.
RIGHT – Move to right.
UP – Jump.
DOWN – Fire.
ENTER – Exit and restart.
SPACE – Show and hide map.
